channel.title: MachosRealm! 24/7! Bank Pins+Tabs! No Lag! Perfect combat and skilling!
channel.description:
You ask yourself, why should I join MachosRealm? What are the benefits? What features do they have? The answer is quite simple.
Over the past few years, I have gone from server to server, game to game, playing the same thing, so I ask myself, why isn't there a unique server unlike anyone else's server? This question boggled in my mind for a while until I realized what my answer was. The answer was to make my own server, MachosRealm.
MachosRealm is a server created and maintained by me, MachoNachos. Over the past few years, I have been in many staff positions on a variety or servers, which eventually died due to lack of players, which was created by the minimal effort from said server's owner, the limited amount of uniqeness, and the minimal amount of creativity and originality. These staff positions gave me knowledge that is helping me now to maintain and support MachosRealm. Most likely, and this is my opinion along with many of my fellow friends, I am the most mature 15 year old you will meet. 15!? he can't possibly be 15 years old. Well friend, I am but most say I act well over my age. Anyways, MachosRealm has many features that most servers dont own. Besides In-game content, we have many other features, both forum and just plainly overall features including our staff team, who monitors the server, and our advertising team. Both teams do an amazing job and maybe, you can join them one day.
The benefits of joining MachosRealm are quite simple. You gain knowledge of the RSPS world, you meet many new friends, and you have a great time. You wouldn't be able to guess how many friends I have made by joining the RSPS world (hint hint, over 80).
A list of features regarding MachosRealm are listed below:D
-A terrific VPS!! -Almost always online! (only time not online is if I am doing updates, which is when I will tell people to log off) -Custom Home unlike any other! -Unique summoning system, log in to find out more :) -Helpful community -Friendly staff. (Me being a staff member of many servers, I have the best knowledge on the staff job and I choose who is best for it) -No weekend updates unless neccesary! (this is for them Friday and Saturday night gamers :D ( You're welcome) -Many updates that improve the game :D -No lag whatsoever! ( I would know, my friend has a dinosaur for a computer and he plays with 100% no lag) -Active owner ( I am almost always online, if not in school, so ask me if you need anything) :D -Great donation benefits ( Thanks for thinking about donating :D We have great benefits and packages to get ahead of other players) -Astonishing combat! -Bank tabs and Bank pins! -10+ bosses -Perfect Skilling and combat! -10+ minigames! -Excellent combat! -Custom donation rank, limited time!!!! ( find out more in donation menu)
MachosRealm is a game unlike anything else. Well stop reading and start playing :D Thanks for joining, MachosRealm.
www.machosrealm.com -Owner MachoNachos

item.title: MachosRealm! 24/7! Bank Pins+Tabs! No Lag! Perfect combat and skilling!

item.description:
@machonachos wrote:

Join this server today!

Features include the above +
-Torva with hp effects
-100% partyroom
-Avatar of Destruction!
-Zaryte Bow
-Rainbow Partyhat
Working clans with lootshare
-Dicing!
-Flower Poker!!!

and so much more!

www.machosrealm.com
